articles.title: Shield AI: Building a High-Performance DNS Security System in Rust
articles.excerpt: How I built an AI-powered DNS filtering system with sub-millisecond latency, ML-based DGA detection, and 15MB memory footprint using Rust and FAISS.

articles.title: Railroad Arcade: Remote-Controlled Model Railroad with Real-Time IoT
articles.excerpt: Building a web app that lets anyone control a real model railroad via Raspberry Pi, with game modes, leaderboards, and sub-100ms latency.

articles.title: LLM Production Patterns: Beyond the Demo
articles.excerpt: The gap between an impressive LLM demo and a reliable production system is massive. Patterns for routing, structured output, context management, and cost control.

articles.title: Building a Production Vector Search Engine for E-Commerce
articles.excerpt: Multimodal product similarity search using CLIP embeddings, FAISS indexing, and FastAPI. Sub-100ms queries across 30k+ products.

articles.title: Building Production AI Infrastructure: Lessons from the Trenches
articles.excerpt: Key insights from years of building and scaling AI/ML systems at enterprise scale, including architecture patterns, performance optimization, and operational best practices.

articles.title: Distributed Systems: Hard Lessons from Production
articles.excerpt: After a decade of building distributed systems serving millions of requests, here are the battle-tested patterns for handling failures, consensus, and partial failures.

articles.title: Why Rust for Systems Programming in 2024
articles.excerpt: Exploring how Rust's memory safety guarantees and zero-cost abstractions make it ideal for building high-performance systems, from network services to embedded applications.

articles.title: Scaling Vector Search: From Prototype to Production
articles.excerpt: Deep dive into vector database architecture, indexing strategies, and performance optimization techniques for handling billions of embeddings.

articles.title: Multi-Agent AI Systems: Patterns and Pitfalls
articles.excerpt: Practical guide to building reliable multi-agent systems using LangGraph, including state management, error handling, and coordination patterns.

articles.title: Kubernetes in Production: What They Don't Tell You
articles.excerpt: Hard-won lessons from running Kubernetes at scale, covering networking, storage, security, and the operational challenges that only surface in production.

articles.title: AI Security in the Enterprise: A Practical Guide
articles.excerpt: Comprehensive overview of security considerations when deploying AI systems, from model security to data privacy and compliance requirements.

articles.title: TypeScript at Scale: Patterns That Actually Work
articles.excerpt: Practical patterns for maintaining large TypeScript codebases, from strict configuration to discriminated unions and runtime validation with Zod.

articles.title: Database Performance: Beyond the Basics
articles.excerpt: Advanced PostgreSQL optimization techniques including covering indexes, connection pooling, cursor pagination, and query analysis strategies.

articles.title: Engineering Career Growth: What Actually Matters
articles.excerpt: Lessons from 12+ years in software engineering on what separates engineers who grow continuously from those who plateau.
